{{Description|Amber's passion truly burns hot.}}
'''Fiery Rain''' is [[Amber]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The skill starts from a certain height calculated from the ground below the target. It may not hit a target that is flying or too high above the ground due to being thrown, knocked back or any other means.
* Fiery Rain consists of 18 waves of hits.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Fiery Rain DMG|1|3}}
* {{TalentNote|character=Amber|talent=Fiery Rain|ascension|1|Every Arrow Finds Its Target}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|It Burns!}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Wildfire}}
